duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide administrative oversight for assigned clinical operational areas and staff-centered support to Master’s-level clinical supervisees.
Collaborate with person-centered teams to provide comprehensive mental health and substance use disorder treatment via Telehealth and in traditional outpatient settings.
Engage directly with clients to deliver evidence-based psychotherapy and social-emotional skills training and support.
Participate in clinical team meetings, continuing education, and collaborative treatment planning with a multidisciplinary team.
Receive regular training in Evidence-Based models of treatment with a Social Justice lens.

education_certification.credential: Master’s Degree or higher in Social Work, Clinical/Counseling Psychology, Mental Health Counseling or Marriage and Family Therapy (required).
